explains: n. [病理] 溃疡；腐烂物；道德败坏
wordGroup: duodenal ulcer 十二指肠溃疡
oral ulcer 口腔或咽喉溃疡

sentences.en: The ulcer had been troubling her for several years.
sentences.cn: 溃疡已经折磨她好几年了。

sentences.en: A 49-year-old lady had presented with an fungal corneal ulcer by a descemetocele and microperforation.
sentences.cn: 一位49岁的患者患有真菌性角膜溃疡并发后弹力层膨出和微小穿孔。
